definition: special importance that is given to something
the extra force given to a word or phrase when spoken, especially in order to show that it is important; a way of writing a word (for example drawing a line below it) to show that it is important
a person who is eligible for something or to do something, is able to have or do it because they have the right qualifications, are the right age, etc.
an eligible young man or woman is thought to be a good choice as a husband/wife, usually because they are rich or attractive
the act of putting information into a special code, especially in order to prevent people from looking at it without authority
clear and easy to understand, so that you have no doubt what is meant
saying something clearly, exactly and openly
describing or showing something, especially sexual activity, with a lot of detail
a word or phrase
things that people say, write or do in order to show their feelings, opinions and ideas
a look on a person’s face that shows their thoughts or feelings
a strong show of feeling when you are playing music, speaking, acting, etc.
a group of signs that represent an idea or a quantity
the outside of something, especially a building
the way that somebody appears or behaves, especially when this is very different from their real feelings or character
the inside part of something
the central part of a country or continent that is a long way from the coast
a country’s own affairs rather than those that involve other countries
from or connected with the western part of the world, especially Europe and America
located in the west or facing west
connected with the west part of the world, especially Europe and North America
connected with or typical of the eastern part of the world, especially China and Japan, and the people who live there
a word or expression in a language that is a translation of a word or expression in another language
a state of balance, especially between different forces or influences
a calm state of mind and a balance of emotions
happening at the end of a period of time or of a process
only to be used by one particular person or group; only given to one particular person or group
not very willing to allow new people to become members, especially if they are from a lower social class
of a high quality and expensive and therefore not often bought or used by most people
not including anything else
not including somebody/something
not able to exist or be a true statement at the same time as something else
the money that you spend on something
something that makes you spend money
money spent in doing a particular job, or for a particular purpose
money that you spend while you are working and that your employer will pay back to you later
paid for by somebody
if you make a joke at somebody’s expense, you laugh at them and make them feel silly
with loss or damage to somebody/something
to spend money on something
to make somebody spend money on something
to officially end a law, a system or an institution
the deliberate ending of a pregnancy at an early stage
a medical operation to end a pregnancy at an early stage
the process of giving birth to a baby before it is fully developed and able to survive
films, music, etc. used to entertain people; an example of this
the act of providing people with somebody to interest them or make them laugh
the act of inviting people to eat or drink with you as your guests
to form an idea, a plan, etc. in your mind
to imagine something
when a woman conceives or conceives a child, she becomes pregnant
to produce children or baby animals
to make somebody/yourself believe that something is true
to persuade somebody to do something
to form an idea of the cost, size, value etc. of something, but without calculating it exactly
a computer that is designed for one person to use at work or at home (the abbreviation for ‘personal computer’)
to affect somebody/something in an unpleasant or harmful way
the study of the way language is affected by differences in social class, region, sex, etc.
unable to see things clearly when they are far away
unable to see what the results of a particular action or decision will be; unable to think about anything outside your own situation
a company or business
a large project, especially one that is difficult
the development of businesses by the people of a country rather than by the government
the ability to think of new projects and make them successful
an organization, a large institution or a hotel
the people in a society or a profession who have influence and power and who usually do not support change
the act of starting or creating something that is meant to last for a long time
belonging to a group of people in society that is small in number but powerful and with a lot of influence, because they are rich, intelligent, etc.
having or showing the greatest ability at the highest level of competition
the value of a company’s shares
the value of a property after all charges and debts have been paid
shares in a company that do not pay a fixed amount of interest
a situation in which everyone is treated equally
a system of natural justice allowing a fair judgement in a situation which is not covered by the existing laws
containing sugar; tasting of sugar
seeming too full of emotion in a way that is not sincere
containing or tasting of salt
funny and sometimes slightly rude
to happen
to exist or be found somewhere
containing only a small amount of fat, or less fat than the usual full-fat version
at a time in the future; after the time you are talking about
a way of saying goodbye, used by young people
at a time in the future; after the time you are talking about
by a particular time and not after it
at some time in the future, even if you are not sure exactly when
after a short time rather than after a long time
a person who does a job without being paid for it
a person who offers to do something without being forced to do it
a person who chooses to join the armed forces without being forced to join
electrical force measured in volts
a yellow fruit like a large lemon
to make a determined effort to deal with a difficult problem or situation
to speak to somebody about a problem or difficult situation
to try and take the ball from an opponent
to make an opponent fall to the ground in order to stop them running
to deal with somebody who is violent or threatening you
to hold somebody/something tightly
to take hold of something suddenly, because you are afraid or in pain
to try all possible means to find a solution or some hope in a difficult or unpleasant situation, even though this seems very unlikely
connected with the science or practice of farming
a person who visits a person or place
a person who looks at a website on the internet
a set of television or radio programmes or podcasts that deal with the same subject or that have the same characters
several events or things of a similar kind that happen one after the other
a set of sports games played between the same two teams
an electrical circuit in which the current passes through all the parts in the correct order
a set of events, actions, numbers, etc. which have a particular order and which lead to a particular result
the order that events, actions, etc. happen in or should happen in
a part of a film that deals with one subject or topic or consists of one scene
a group or type of people or things that are similar in a particular way
a particular type of person
the process of putting data in a particular order
used to say that you think somebody’s behaviour is very strange or unusual but that everyone is different and likes different things
used to emphasize that the situation is very different from what has been said
used when you are saying that something is not a good example of a particular type of thing
ill or upset
to some extent but in a way that you cannot easily describe
used for describing something in a not very exact way
to close or join together the two parts of something; to become closed or joined together
to close something so that it will not open; to be closed in this way
to fix something in a particular position
to attach or tie one thing to another thing

if you fasten your arms around somebody, your teeth into something, etc., or if your arms, teeth, etc. fasten around, into, etc. somebody/something, you hold the person/thing strongly with your arms, etc.
if you fasten your eyes on somebody/something or your eyes fasten on somebody/something, you look at them for a long time
to make something less tight or strongly fixed; to become less tight or strongly fixed
to make a piece of clothing, hair, etc. loose, when it has been tied or fastened
to hold somebody/something less tightly
to make something weaker or less carefully managed than before
to make somebody talk more freely than usual
to recognize somebody/something and be able to say who or what they are
to find or discover somebody/something
to make it possible to recognize who or what somebody/something is
to start to talk about something that is not connected with the main point of what you are saying
a glass building where orange trees are grown
a stupid person
to move backwards or forwards or from side to side while hanging from a fixed point; to make something do this
to move from one place to another by holding something that is fixed and pulling yourself along, up, etc.
to move or make something move with a wide curved movement
to change or make somebody/something change from one opinion, mood, etc. to another
to turn or change direction suddenly; to make something do this
to try to hit somebody/something
to succeed in getting or achieving something, sometimes in a slightly dishonest way
to have a strong rhythm
if a party, etc. is swinging, there are a lot of people there having a good time
when somebody says there’s no room to swing a cat, they mean that a room is very small and that there is not enough space
to affect the result of something in one way rather than another
to be bisexual (= sexually attracted to both men and women)
to really try to achieve something great, even when it is not reasonable to expect to be so successful
to start doing something quickly and with a lot of energy
to pretend to be ill when in fact you are not, especially to avoid work
of or connected with the Netherlands, its people or its language
to share the cost of something with somebody
in or connected with the first stages of a course of study
of the most basic kind
very simple and easy
a small group of musicians who play popular music together, often with a singer or singers
a group of musicians who play brass and percussion instruments
a group of people who do something together or who have the same ideas, interests or achievements
a thin flat piece or circle of any material that is put around things, for example to hold them together or to make them stronger
a line of colour or material on something that is different from what is around it
a range of radio waves
a range of numbers, ages, prices, etc. within which people or things are counted or measured
used for making suggestions or as a polite way of telling people what you want them to do
used for offering help to somebody
used for making requests or giving instructions
to allow somebody to do something or something to happen without trying to stop it
to give somebody permission to do something
to allow somebody/something to go somewhere
used to show that you are not afraid or worried about somebody doing something
used to express a strong wish for something to happen
used to introduce what you are going to say or do
used to say that you are supposing something to be true when you calculate something
to allow somebody to use a house, room, etc. in return for regular payments
to stop trying to change the behaviour or state of somebody/something
to mention something in a conversation, by accident or as if by accident
to allow somebody to be free
to make somebody have to leave their job
to stop holding somebody/something
to give up an idea or an attitude, or control of something
to stop taking care of a house, garden, etc.
to attack somebody physically or with words
to say or do no more about something
used when you are thinking or trying to remember something
used when commenting on a situation to suggest that you could say something more or worse but prefer not to
used when making a suggestion or giving an example
to behave in a relaxed way without worrying about what people think of your behaviour
to stop being careful about how you look and dress, etc.
available for rent
to let somebody come out of a place where they have been kept or stuck and unable to leave or move
to stop holding something or stop it from being held so that it can move, fly, fall, etc. freely
to express feelings such as anger or worry in order to get rid of them
to remove something from a fixed position, allowing something else to move or function
to make information available to the public
to make a film, recording or other product available to the public
to make something available that had previously been limited
to free somebody from a duty, responsibility, contract, etc.
to make something less tight
to join together with other people in order to do something as a group
to make people or things join together to form a unit; to join together
the form in which a book, newspaper, etc. is published
a version of a book or other text that is regularly revised
a particular newspaper or magazine, or radio or television programme, especially one in a regular series
the total number of copies of a book, newspaper or magazine, etc. published at one time
the steady growth of something so that it becomes more advanced, stronger, etc.
the growth of the economy of a country or region through increased business activity
the process of producing or creating something new or more advanced; a new or advanced product or idea
a new event or stage that is likely to affect what happens in a continuing situation
a piece of land with new buildings on it
the process of using an area of land, especially to make a profit by building on it, etc.
the height of something in relation to the ground or to what it used to be
a floor of a building; a layer of ground

a particular standard or quality
a position or rank in a scale of size or importance
a particular way of looking at, reacting to or understanding something
one of a series of stages in a computer game. Players progress from easy to more advanced levels within the game.
